EmailTemplate.name: ABC3_Vegas.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Going to the Vegas ABC3 Conference? Stop by and Checkout Our Online Billing and ePCR Software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}},
Stop by and see us at PWW's ABC3 conference meet Product Manager, Dan Voss, and Customer Account Managers, Brenda Taylor and Tyler Harman.
See a demonstration of our online Sweet Billing and Fusion ePCR solutions, or our VisiCAD for EMS application.
Take 5 minutes to view a short video <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-CdXqYEvP00" target="_blank> of EMS1 Chris Montero's discussion with TriTech Senior Product Manager, Charlie Barry, about the Future of EMS Software.
Can't make the conference? Call us at 800.537.3927
